hotel.name: Grand Ocean Resort
hotel.description: A luxurious beachfront resort offering stunning ocean views, premium spa services, and world-class dining.

amenities.wifi: Free high-speed WiFi in all areas
amenities.spa: Full-service spa with sauna and massages
amenities.kids_play_area: Dedicated indoor play area for kids
amenities.pet_friendly: Pets allowed in designated rooms (extra charge may apply)

special_offers.name: Romantic Getaway Package
special_offers.description: Includes a beachfront dinner, spa treatment, and a luxury suite stay.

special_offers.name: Family Fun Package
special_offers.description: Includes kids' play area access, free meals for children under 10, and a guided beach tour.

booking_policies.cancellation: Full refund if canceled 48 hours before check-in. 50% charge if canceled within 24 hours.

nearby_attractions.name: Palm Bay Marina
nearby_attractions.description: Boat rentals, fishing charters, and waterfront dining.
nearby_attractions.entry_fee: Free entry, but activity prices vary.

nearby_attractions.name: Sunset Beach Boardwalk
nearby_attractions.description: A scenic boardwalk with shops, cafes, and live music.

nearby_attractions.name: Ocean Wildlife Park
nearby_attractions.description: A conservation park with dolphin shows, sea turtle exhibits, and snorkeling tours.

faq.question: What time is check-in and check-out?
faq.answer: Check-in is at 3:00 PM, and check-out is at 11:00 AM.

faq.question: Do you offer airport shuttle services?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide complimentary airport shuttle services from Palm Bay International Airport.

faq.question: Is breakfast included in the room price?
faq.answer: Breakfast is included for Executive Suites and higher. Other rooms can add breakfast for $20 per person.

faq.question: Are pets allowed in the hotel?
faq.answer: Yes, we have pet-friendly rooms available for an additional charge.

faq.question: What is the hotel's cancellation policy?
faq.answer: Cancellations are free if made 48 hours before check-in. A 50% charge applies if canceled within 24 hours.
